name: jspaint.exe
description: My new Grader App! This is the Grader.JS base template repository. You can customize this package.json and other files to start building your app. See the README for how to.

scripts.stats: npm run super-clean && getstats && cat stats/* || :
scripts.upgrade: npm run super-clean || : && npm upgrade && npm i
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && ./scripts/build.sh && npm run zip && echo $(pwd) && chmod +x build/*.cjs
scripts.build-nix: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary-nix
scripts.build-win: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary-win
scripts.build-mac: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary-mac
scripts.dl-node: npm run dl-node-nix && npm run dl-node-win && npm run dl-node-mac && npm run dl-node-32
scripts.dl-node-32: npx nexe -t windows-x32 -o bin/hello.win32.exe -i src/hello.js -r "./build/*" && npx nexe -t linux-x32 -o bin/hello.nix32 -i src/hello.js -r "./build/*"
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ bin/ src/build/ dev/ *.log *.error || : && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p bin

author: @dosy
